item.name: Redis Role
item.description: Identifies system as master or slave in a redis ha system.

item_prototype.name: Aof enabled (1 is yes, 0 is no)
Aof last bgrewrite (1 is ok, 0 is fail)
Aof rewrite in progress (1 is yes, 0 is no)
Aof rewrite scheduled (1 is yes, 0 is no)
item_prototype.description: Is AOF rewriting is blocked by save

item_prototype.name: rdb bgsave in progress (1 is yes)

trigger_prototype.name: {HOST.NAME} Redis {#REDIS_PORT} AOF last bgrewrite fail !
trigger_prototype.description: Did the last AOF rewrite operation fail

trigger_prototype.name: {HOST.NAME} Redis {#REDIS_PORT} AOF rewrite blocked by RDB SAVE !
trigger_prototype.description: Are AOF rewrites blocked by RDB save operations

trigger_prototype.name: {HOST.NAME} Redis {#REDIS_PORT} AOF rewrite in progress long time !
trigger_prototype.description: All 20 consecutive tests are performed with AOF rewrite, AOF rewrite takes too long,need check. Which can be adjusted according to the monitoring frequency.

trigger_prototype.name: {HOST.NAME} Redis {#REDIS_PORT} latest fork time is too long !
trigger_prototype.description: The last fork took more than 1s (info is microsecond, converted to milliseconds).Default not enable.

trigger_prototype.name: {HOST.NAME} Redis {#REDIS_PORT} maxmemory use 95% !
trigger_prototype.description: Use_memory exceeds 95% of the maxmemory configured.

trigger_prototype.name: {HOST.NAME} Redis {#REDIS_PORT} mem fragmentation ratio Too high !
trigger_prototype.description: mem_fragmentation_ratio > 2 or mem_fragmentation_ratio < 0.8 , Default not enable.

graph_prototype.name: Redis {#REDIS_PORT} Port PING and latest fork

item_prototype.name: Master link status (1 is up,0 is down)

trigger.name: Redis Role Change on {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: Triggers if the role changes. Does not allow for automatic trigger
